situation: I hate my job but I am scared to quit and seek a new career.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Hello

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Hello, what would you like to talk about?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I am having a lot of anxiety about quitting my current job. It is too stressful but pays well

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: What makes your job stressful for you?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I have to deal with many people in hard financial situations and it is upsetting

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Do you help your clients to make it to a better financial situation?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I do, but often they are not going to get back to what they want. Many people are going to lose their home when safeguards are lifted

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: But you offer them a better future than what they have currently. It may not be what they wanted, but it helps them in the long run.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That is true but sometimes I feel like I should put my feelings and health first

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I can understand that.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Is there another job that would pay you close to what you currently make?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Probably not. I was with the same company for a long time and I consistently get a bonus every year

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Is it possible to reframe how you look at your clients' dire financial situations?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I could try. It mostly gets to me at the end of the day

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Some people can't do what you do because they don't have the heart to give someone else bad news. The reality is though, someone needs to fill that role and you do help people

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That is also true. Sometimes I wonder if it really is for me though

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I've had to deal with collections before when I was in  bad financial condition. The person on the other line was really helpful though. She was understanding,

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: It may not be for you. I think you should think about the pros and cons of keeping your position. It might make things clearer for you.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That is true. Maybe I just need to sit down and really think about it

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I wouldn't stay if it really impacts your mental health in a negative way. Still, you may need to zoom out and see the bigger picture: that you provide a needed service and you do it compassionately

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: It really is a big decision

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Thank you for the different perspective

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: No doubt, but you know in your heart what is right for you.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That is true. Thanks again

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Bye

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: It's no problem. I hope you can make a decision about this situation and then be at peace with it

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Ok, take care

seeker_question2: More guidance in conversation or examples
